name: Sock Noir
description:
Something is rotten in the sock drawer...

You play as an ex-cop, now private detective trying to unravel the high profile case, that found its way to your desk.

Why are so many socks going missing? Who are pulling the strings? How many puns can the Devs make on sockpuppets. The world of Sock Noir awaits for you to find out.

GGJ 2021 

Credits:  

Nils "Gecko" Munch, 
Jonas Lohardt Havlykke, 
Daniel "Zenreth" Thomsen and 
Jill L. Petersen
